title: Understanding Yemen, Part 1
itunes:title: Understanding Yemen, Part 1
description:
In trying to understand how present-day Yemen became one of the largest humanitarian crises in the world, Shereen talks us through some key moments in Yemen’s history up to 2018.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
